summary: After a failed marriage, Masha retreats to the sanctuary of her humble profession as a translator of serious literature. Financial difficulties force her to accept an offer to interpret during a seminar held by an English puppeteer.
cast: Madlen Dzhabrailova|Jethro Skinner|Vladimir Ilin|Miriam Sekhon|Yelena Semyonova|Artyom Zhimolokhov|Miroslava Karpovich|Andrei Schchennikov|Pavel Derevyanko|Yuri Kolokolnikov|Evgeniy Tsyganov|Oleg Dolin|Anna Ilyushchenko|Yelizaveta Kleinot|Fyodor Makarov|Alisa Oleynik|Dashi Rabdanov|Grigori Tatarenko|Dmitriy Arosev|Irina Allo|Pavel Tatarenko|Regina Yunusova|Aleksandr Adabashyan|Andrey Merzlikin|Tomas Motskus|Tagir Rakhimov|Sergey Frolov|Mikhail Krylov|Kirill Pirogov|Aleksey Slepak|Anna Danilova|Vladimir Fyodorov|Igor Kotsarev|Tatyana Monakhova|Aleksandr Novikov|Maksim Osipenko
keywords: title directed by female|f rated|puppet|moscow russia|tourist
title: Plyus odin
